prompt.label: Prompt

sourceImages.label: Source Image(s) [Max: 10]

mask.label: Mask
mask.instructions: Draw on the image below to mark areas for editing (drawn areas become transparent in the mask).

mask.dimensionMismatch: Mask dimensions ({{maskWidth}}x{{maskHeight}}) must match the source image dimensions ({{imageWidth}}x{{imageHeight}}).
mask.failedToLoadMask: Failed to load the uploaded mask image to check dimensions.

validation.selectAtLeastOneImage: Please select at least one image to edit.
validation.saveMaskBeforeSubmit: Please save the mask you have drawn before submitting.
